We specialize in the repair, refurbishment, and re-manufacture of used ISO Tanks and the design and construction of ISO Tanks.

316L SS Tank Innovations was founded in 1994 by James Michael Rose, Marine Engineer. We work with companies across a variety of industries due to our decades of expertise and ability to customize our tanks for each client’s needs: food grade, kosher, insulated, cryogenic, heated, self-cleaning, temperature controlled, vertical or sized to spec and more.

About ISO Tanks

An ISO Tank is a tank container built to the ISO (International Organization for Standardization) standard for simple intermodal transport and storage. ISO Tanks are designed to carry and store hazardous and non-hazardous liquids in bulk and come in a variety of sizes and materials. They are cylindrical and stackable when horizontal, but can be converted to stand vertically.

For 26 years, ROAM has specialized in the repair, refurbishment, and re-manufacture of used ISO Tanks and the design and construction of new spec ISO Tanks, in addition to the manufacture and sale of flexitanks. Our value to you is in our expertise and turnkey solutions that allow you to achieve your processing, manufacturing or bulk liquid transport and storage needs. We work with you to reach your business goals by building up your operations in a simple, cost-effective way.
